thread.title: PK
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by PK

author: PK
title: PK
text:
Order was delivered the following day as promised, the item l ordered didn't suit, sent it back with free delivery & refunded within a few days. Ordered replacement item which I'm totally happy with
No hassle great service, couldn't ask for more- defiantly recommend this company 100% satisfaction.
